casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF the INVOLUNTARY TERMINATION OF the PARENT-CHILD RELATIONSHIP OF D.S., et al. (Minor Children),
and
N.N. (Father) and R.N. (Mother), Appellants-Respondents,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-809 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED October 17, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BAILEY , J.

Affirmed.

MATHIAS, J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.
